hiveArticle.title: Open mic week 41... Bring on the night.... (original music)
hiveArticle.body:
Hello all fellow steemians.

I just  finished writing this song today. 

I hope you enjoy.

Please upvote/ resteem if you like the song . Also I would love your comments and feedback.

Peace and love.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6Q3_91y7Pmk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>


The lyrics :
She's walking with the wind
turning all the tides
you feel her desire
it’s burning like a fire.

Bring on the night she says
You are the only one
let’s ride the night she says 
I want to feel and run.

She's racing out of time
loosing all her rides
looking for a reason
she's churning out her lies.

Bring on the night she says
I am the only one 
let’s ride the night she says
I want to steal the sun.

Into the arms of the night
I wants to run and run
And from the light of the day
I wants to steal the sun......
